description:
Assassins Kazuki Kurusu and Rei Suwa meet Miri, a girl looking for her father on Christmas Day. Kazuki, Rei, and Miri unexpectedly end up living together.

Follows Kazuki Kurusu, a criminal contractor/coordinator who lives with his best friend, Rei Suwa, a professional assassin who has been raised from childhood to be a contract killer. Kazuki is outgoing and loves gambling and women, while Rei is a man of few words who spends his off time playing video games. One day, the two buddies end up caring for Miri Unasaka, a four year old girl whose father is a mafia boss, after Miri accidentally wanders into a firefight in a hotel while looking for her father.

node.description:
Worked for Games Gurafikka company until 2003. Since 2004 working as a freelance illustrator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/enonami) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/15820)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/6_kai)__

__Residency:__ Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Yoshihide Mukai__ is a Japanese visual effects specialist and CG artist.

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/roundkitagawa)

**Katsutoshi Kitagawa** is part of the music group [Round Table](https://anilist.co/staff/104727/Round-Table) and is responsible for vocals, guitar, and bass guitar.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayase_0404) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayase_0404/) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/86488427) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/Ayase_0404) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvpredjG93ifbCP1Y77JyFA)__

Ayase is a Japanese composer, lyricist, arranger and member of the music duo [YOASOBI](https://anilist.co/staff/194287/YOASOBI).

[Website (Sony Music)](https://www.sonymusic.co.jp/artist/durdn/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DURDN__) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/durdn__/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@durdnofficialchannel6047) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5u1MCRvQ3cA2Y9BpLSZIeg)

DURDN is a music project consisting of the Japanese duo 'tee tea' (SHINTA + yacco) and Korean vocalist/songwriter Baku.

__Members:__
• Baku - Vocals
• SHINTA - Trackmaker ([Twitter](https://twitter.com/shintaP4061) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/shinta.178.210))
• yacco - Topliner
